text: "La Balanguera" (Balearic pronunciation: ; "The Balanguera") is the anthem of the Balearic Islands. ==Lyrics== Catalan original Majorcan Catalan IPA Spanish translation English translation I O mysterious Balanguera, like a spider of fine art, her spinning wheel emptieth and off our lives it pulleth. ğ„† Like a Parca she pondereth, and seweth well tomorrow's cloth. The Balanguera spinneth, spinneth and the Balanguera shall spin. ğ„‡ II Her glimpse to the past she turneth, O'er shades of ancestry she watcheth, and of the new spring she owneth; Of the seed's cover she knoweth. ğ„† She knoweth that the stump higher climbeth, the deeper its roots can go. The Balanguera spinneth, spinneth and the Balanguera shall spin. ğ„‡ III From traditions and from hopes The flag for the youth she weaveth as one who a wedding veil prepareth with hairs of gold and silver ğ„† of the cradle that groweth of the old age that departeth. The Balanguera spinneth, spinneth and the Balanguera shall spin. ğ„‡ ==References== Category:Balearic Islands Category:Spanish anthems
title: La Balanguera
